title: GTA Online
headline: GTA Online
subtitle: 2X GTA$ and RP on Drift Races
content:
Stay in control of your vehicle as you slide around corners while smoking the competition in Drift Races forÂ 2X GTA$ and RP.

Players with an LS Car Meet Membership can get started by speaking with the Race Organizer in the LS Car Meet, or through Quick Join on your iFruit. Fulfil the Weekly Challenge by participating in six Drift Races for a reward of GTA$100,000 and the Rockstar Helmet.
